ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Disguised as Vipers, the Collins family are spirited away safely by the Dreadnoks while Zartan, Storm Shadow, Granny Demon and Snake Eyes confront Dawn about her identity. Doctor Venom realizes Zartan has betrayed Cobra Commander. In Trucial Abysmia, the US Embassy is attacked by insurgents and four Joes are sent to defend the compound until extraction, but the extraction helicopter is shot down.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 14:54:27. [CVDB612017] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:40:07. [Issue ID 1734081]
